product_name: CamelBak Octane 18X Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz.
long_description: The expandable CamelBak Octane 18X Hydration Pack is ideal for 3+ hours on the trail. It weighs only 1.2 lbs. and boasts 15 liters of gear capacity-enough for all your multisport essentials. 100 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir features a welded center baffle and low-profile shape for stability. Quick Link(TM) system lets you effortlessly add accessories such as a Fresh(TM) filter, insulated tube, tube director or flow meter (accessories sold separately). Hydration compartment loads easily, holding the reservoir flat against your back to leave more room for layers and gear. Wide-mouth port makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Folding arms lock into position to hold the reservoir open when drying; arms tuck out of the way around the port when not in use. Back panel with breathable mesh enhances ventilation and comfort. Shoulder straps and hipbelt have stash pockets for snacks and often-used small essentials. CamelBak Octane 18X Hydration Pack's main compartment holds lunch or gear; center front zipper opens to expand capacity for additional cargo.
short_description: The expandable CamelBak Octane 18X Hydration Pack is ideal for 3+ hours on the trail. It weighs only 1.2 lbs. and boasts 15 liters of gear capacity-enough for all your multisport essentials.
